page_content:
New Reports - Individual Report

Version:MissionOS_2.0

A new Web Report is configured by first clicking Report Creation > Batched Reports, then navigating to the New Reports tab. (the web reports created here are different from the web reports generated from the Homepage Instrument Data interface).

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Report Type drop-down contains 3 items listed as Report Types:

  • Individual Report
  • Summary Report
  • Graph Report

Method 1:

To create a new individual report, perform the following steps:

  1. Select the option Individual Report from the Report Type drop-down field.
  2. In the Title field, type the title for the Report.
  3. In the Instruments section, select one of the following options:
  • All Instruments of the following
  • Selected Instruments

If you select All Instruments of the following, new fields appear as drop-downs. Select from the drop-downs as required:

  • Object Class Type
  • Object Classes
  • Type
  • Subtype
  • Project
  • Contract
  • Site
  • Zone

 

 

 

 

  1. Select from the Date Range options as given below:
  • Last 1 day
  • Last 3 days
  • Last 1 week
  • Last 2 weeks
  • Last 1 month
  • Last 3 months
  • Select days from-to manually.
  • Recent readings
  • Specific dates (if you select this option, place the cursor in the field below to select the required dates)
  1. Select the checkbox Exclude instruments without data if required.
  2. Choose Graph Template, based on preference.

 

 

 

  1. Select the following checkboxes if required:
  • Hide AAA lines (hides trigger level lines on graphs)
  • Group graphs of all instruments
  1. Choose Report Template from the drop-down.

 

Note:

Report template populates from those created under Tables tab in Object Definition interface. For more information on creating Tables template, refer to the manual Table Template Creation (Normal Instruments)

 

  1. Click Choose File to Choose Images. Then click Upload.
  2. Finally, click Save Report.
    The Report gets saved and listed under the Reports’ Library tab, and New Binder

 

 

 

  1. To view the report, go to the Reports’ Library
  2. Type the title of the report in the Search field, then click Search. Or scroll down to see the newly created Report.
  3. Click the Web Report button to view the report in another browser tab.

 

Note:

  • Click Edit to edit the report.
  • Click Delete to delete the report.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Method 2:

To create a new individual report, perform the following steps:

  1. Select the option Individual Report from the Report Type drop-down field.
  2. In the Title field, type the title for the Report.
  3. In the Instruments section, choose Selected Instruments option, then select from the following drop-down fields that appear:
  • Object Class Type
  • Object Classes
  • Type
  • Subtype
  • Project
  • Contract
  • Site
  • Zone
  1. Click Search to search for the instruments belonging to the above filter criteria.

 

 

 

  1. The instruments get listed in the Instruments List
  2. Select the desired instrument(s) with the cursor and click the Add selected instruments, or Add All Instruments
  3. This results in instruments getting added to the Selected Instruments

 

 

 

 

Note:

The remaining steps in creating an individual report are the same as that explained under Method 1.

  1. Select from the Date Range options as given below:
  • Last 1 day
  • Last 3 days
  • Last 1 week
  • Last 2 weeks
  • Last 1 month
  • Last 3 months
  • Or select days from-to manually.
  • Recent readings
  • Specific dates (if you select this option, place the cursor in the field below to select the required dates)
  1. Select the checkbox Exclude instruments without data if required.
  2. Choose Graph Template, based on preference.
  3. Select the following checkboxes, if required:
  • Hide AAA lines
  • Group graphs of all instruments
  1. Choose Report Template from the drop-down.
  2. Click Choose File to Choose Images. Then click Upload.
  3. Finally, click Save Report.
    The Report gets saved and listed under the Reports’ Library.
  4. To view the report, go to the Reports’ Library
  5. Type the title of the report in the Search field, then click Search.
  6. Click Web Report against the listed report. The report opens in a new browser tab.

 

 

 

In the New Binder tab, you can select the newly created listed report and attach it to a new Binder Report.

The Binder Report once created is listed under the Binders’ Library tab. Click open the to see the attached report. You can further add reports if desired using the Add Reports button.

You can send the Binder Report as email (Send E-mail button).
